attributes.action: scrap plans to increase the number of days a terror suspect can be held.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is absolutely no reason to increase the number of days from 28 to any amount since an extension can already be granted through the courts.  Increasing the limit still further heightens the risk that an innocent person could be held without charge and therefore we could end up with another guantanamo bay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
